about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Bodhi Tree Multimedia Ltd's is primarily engaged in content production for television, films and other digital platforms. The business operates in 3 key segments that are TV - Hindi General Entertainment Channels (GEC), Digital Platforms (OTT), and Regional shows in multiple languages. The company produces big or small films, TV serials for various TV channels in India and abroad.

The company is engaged in different types of content production such as Audio, Video content, and Text various shows from different genres - drama, comedy, thriller, horror, lifestyle, and others. Since its establishment, the business has successfully produced more than 30+ shows in multiple languages for OTT players and broadcasters and 1000+ hours of content for TV and OTT. Its client base includes Amazon, Netflix, Star TV Network, Disney, Zee, and others.

Company's business verticals or key business areas include:
1. TV - Hindi GEC where they produce daily soaps, reality shows etc for big broadcast networks like Zee, Sony, Star, Disney, Viacom, Sun and others.
2. Digital Platforms (OTT): In this vertical, company produce content for non-linear digital platforms such as Netflix, Voot, etc.
3. Regional Shows: Content production in regional languages such as Tamil, Bengali, Marathi and Gujarati on television and OTT platforms.

Competitive Strengths

• Strong brand preposition.
• Diversified production portfolio in different languages.
• Highly experienced team of writers, artists, and directors.
• Efficient sales and marketing tactics.

contactDetails.full_address: Bodhi Tree Multimedia Ltd, 507 Reliable Business Centre, Jogeshwari (West), Mumbai - 400102

faqs.question: What is the Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO?
faqs.answer:
Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO is a SME IPO of 390000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.71 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹95 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on October 9, 2020, and closes on October 13, 2020.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO opens on October 9, 2020 and closes on October 13, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO?
faqs.answer: Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,14,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO will be done on Friday, October 16, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 13, 2020. Check the Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Bodhi Tree Multimedia IPO listing date is on Wednesday, October 21, 2020.
